name: Amazon S3 One Zone-Infrequent Access
short: A cost-effective Amazon S3 storage class for infrequently accessed data stored in a single availability zone.
description: Amazon S3 One Zone-Infrequent Access (S3 One Zone-IA) is a cost-effective AWS storage class for infrequently accessed data. It stores data in a single AWS Availability Zone, making it cheaper than other S3 storage classes, but with less redundancy. It's ideal for secondary backup copies, or data easily re-created. It offers the same high durability, throughput, and low latency as other S3 classes. S3 One Zone-IA ensures that businesses can manage and scale their storage needs economically without sacrificing performance.
